creator: AIO Studio (Best Apps For Mobile)
descriptionHtml:
This is the audio recording application that needs to be available on your phone, Voice Recorder helps you to record audio in a professional and easy way right on your phone. Use this sound recorder and editor app to record meetings, speeches, lectures, songs with high quality and more!

For Students

Assist in recording lectures and lessons with clear quality, even if the teacher is not near you. Hear and record important knowledge to help you get to hear and learn back to the upcoming exam with professional sound recording. It is not limited to recording time and is very easy to record lessons and lectures long with mp3 voice recorder.

For Business

Record your interviews and meetings from your phone with record bluetooth audio, record phone conversations with noise reduction for recorded audio. Then share them with your colleagues via email or your favorite messaging application, record conversations in a meeting. Make use of the widget and shortcut powerful to start new recordings right from the Home screen.

For Musicians and People

With a wide variety of options for refining recordings, this audio recorder for android is useful for rehearsal and audio-visual sessions. Quickly try new ideas, hear the results and make new changes. You can quickly switch between voice recorders, meetings, lectures, music and sound rough with settings and extremely easy to use presets.

With this audio recorder and editor software you can record sounds from your phone. This application also supports voice recorder with noise cancellation, voice recorder volume booster. Karaoke voice recorder app, sound recorder convert to mp3, sound record and edit.

Highlights of the Voice Recorder application

- Record in MP3, FLAC (PCM), high quality WAV, good quality AAC (m4a/mp4) and AMR (3gp) to save space.
- Share files easily via Gmail, Bluetooth, Drive...
- Supports fast recording on the shortcut in the notification bar or outside the main screen
- Support play video recordings in the application with speed and Repeat mode ...
- Simple user interface
- Voice recorder samsung, audio recorder for samsung.
- Custom bitrate can vary from 32 to 320 kbps when audio recorder high quality
- Support for voice recorder bluetooth mic (Some models do not support)
- Manage your recording easily: Delete, Edit, Share ...
- Supports many options including: stereo, silent skip, volume boost, custom bitrare, sound recorder amplifier and more.
- Song recorder studio with music, recorder audio cutter
- Karaoke recorder with high quality, karaoke music recorder.
- Audio recorder in mp3 format, high quality sound recording
- Best quality audio recorder, good quality sound recorder.
- Noise free sound recorder, voice recorder noise reduction
- Increase the input volume thanks to micro enhancement
- Record in the background (even if the screen is off)
- Supports cut audio files in a simple way, cut audio recording
- Record phone conversations, recording studio app free
- Record while playing music
- Aaudio recorder to mp3 converter
- Set as ringtone, alarm, or notification sound
- Pause recording when an incoming call with sound record software.
- Supports many different interfaces
- Many new features will be updated in the future
- Option to save recording file
- Sort records by date, name, size and time
